programme.title: Dave Gorman: Modern Life is Goodish
programme.desc: Dave Gorman is now into his third series examining the quirks of modern life. In this episode, Dave suggests radically overhauling the calendar, and reveals what you learn when you buy twitter followers.

programme.title: Dave Gorman: Modern Life is Goodish
programme.desc: Focus is on the current obsession with customer feedback and market research. Just how reliable is this data? Dave tries to find out with the help of the fans of Ant. And Dec.

programme.title: Dave Gorman: Modern Life is Goodish
programme.desc: A convoluted method for getting rid of an unwanted gift, a classic game show reimagined, the diamond industry brought to its knees and he’s just getting warmed up.

programme.title: Dave Gorman: Modern Life is Goodish
programme.desc: With the help of a roomful of photographs of Alan Sugar, he devises an experiment to discover whether people’s behaviour is the same in the real world as it is online.

programme.title: Anger Management: Charlie Spends the Night with Lacey
programme.desc: Charlie helps Lacey keep her anger in check.

programme.title: Anger Management: Charlie Screws a Prisoner's Girlfriend
programme.desc: An ill-advised tryst puts Charlie in the sights of a soon-to-be-released prisoner.

programme.title: The Winning Season
programme.desc: From Sundance 2007 Audience Award-Winning Director James Strouse, and starring the inimitable Sam Rockwell and fast rising star Emma Roberts, comes the hilarious story of a washed up basketball coach who must learn to overcome his love of booze, his chauvinistic attitude towards women and his overdeveloped macho nature, in order to re-invent himself as a real man and give a bunch of no-hopers a shot at a Winning Season!

programme.title: Tell Me I Love You
programme.desc: A romantic comedy set in beachfront Malibu, and the vibrant Hollywood music scene...Tell Me I Love You tells the story of three talented young musicians (Ben, Ally, Melanie) roommates, bandmates and ex-lovers who pull off a hilarious scam to pay for their first album. However their past romantic affairs, emerging sexuality, and highly unique concept of "family" disrupt societal conventions. With a hit album on the way and music industry stardom right at their fingertips, they must each decide what true love is, and what they each mean to each other.

programme.title: Swiped
programme.desc: A womanising college student (Noah Centineo) enlists his nerdy roommate (Kendall Sanders) to code the ultimate hook up app by offering to pay his tuition for MIT but unexpected consequences ensue.

programme.title: Air Bud
programme.desc: Life hasn’t been too hot for Josh Framm, a 12-year old boy who just lost his father and has moved to a whole new city. Without any friends and an inclination toward shyness, Josh prefers to practice alone rather than try out for the team. That all changes when Josh meets Buddy, a runaway golden retriever with a wicked talent for shooting hoops. They become fast friends and quickly form a dynamic duo on the school basketball team. Their talent generates a media frenzy that attracts Buddy’s greedy former owner, who wants to cash in on his suddenly lucrative pup.

programme.title: Love Wrecked
programme.desc: Jenny Taylor (Amanda Bynes) has found her ideal man who she just knows would sweep her off her feet. The only problem? He's Jason Masters (Chris Carmack), the world's biggest rock star. Hoping for a chance to get close to her idol, Jenny takes a job in his favourite Caribbean resort with her best friend Ryan (Jonathan Bennett). When Jason is washed overboard in a storm, Jenny jumps in to save him and the pair find themselves stranded on a seemingly-deserted tropical island.

programme.title: Couples Vacation
programme.desc: With his marriage and career against the ropes, dejected author Jack Spencer travels with his wife, Amanda, to an isolated glamping retreat in search of a spark. When a surprise double booking finds their private retreat anything but private, Jack spins into a comedic exploration of love, lost dreams, small-town-wisdom, and friendship with a miniature donkey to get over himself before he loses all he holds dear.

programme.title: Controversial History
programme.desc: Looking for truth through accounts and memories of the three main characters of WWII events that diverge between Jews, Latvians and Russians.

programme.title: Green is the new black
programme.desc: Fashion dictates that we must buy, buy, buy. We take a behind the scenes look into the apparel industry to see what big brands are doing to improve their eco-footprint. Or is it their eco-image?

programme.title: Becoming Immortal: Digital Cloning
programme.desc: Russian transhumanist Alexey Turchin records audio, video, and EEG brain scans in a bid for digital immortality.

programme.title: The Age of Robots
programme.desc: By the year 2050, three quarters of the world’s population will live in urban areas. Looking at robotic systems being developed worldwide we can take a glimpse at the city life of the future. Private transportation with self-driving cars, our homes with automated systems - robots are in our future.

programme.title: Sunakali
programme.desc: Mugu in Western Nepal is one of the least developed regions in Nepal. According to the 2011 Nepal Census, 90% of women in Mugu are illiterate. Sunakali Budha, a 13 year-old girl saw football for the first time in 2011 and in less than three years time she has become a star in her village.

programme.title: A Time For Making
programme.desc: Nine artisans on secluded Gabriola Island reveal the differences between mass manufactured and authentic locally handmade through intimate portraits of their work and lifestyle.

programme.title: The Superpowers of the Bear
programme.desc: Human civilizations throughout history have always lived in fear and admiration of the wild bear. Now, scientists are on the verge of discovering the biological and physiological secrets of these elusive creatures to help solve human health problems associated with kidneys, neurological disorders, osteoporosis and obesity. We will meet scientists, visit laboratories and go out into the field to study these animals’ behavior, to discover how one day the bear might revolutionize our lives!

programme.title: Antarctica - Tales from the End of the World
programme.desc: The Antarctic region is undoubtedly one of the most remote and inhospitable, yet one of the most beautiful landscapes of the world. This documentary takes us on a journey to the stormy isolated islands of the Southern Ocean. Seals, penguins, seabirds and other animals live and breed in this hostile environment and harsh climate. Only by an icebreaker can we reach the remote coasts of the Antarctic continent where Emperor Penguins defy the life-threatening environment at the end of the world.

programme.title: Beary Tales
programme.desc: The touching film shows the adolescence of two bear twins as they live with their new "mother" Vaclav in the Bohemian Forest. It documents the cubs' first steps and follows their development from defenseless babies to cheeky 60-kilo teenagers. The two cubs, abandoned by their mother, would have been destined to death – if Vaclav had not adopted them. It’s the story about two - or three! - extraordinary characters that manage, despite all the differences, to walk their way together.

programme.title: Ancient Grains - Quinoa
programme.desc: When you open your pantry, do images of the rugged mountains of South America, the colorful tablelands of Africa and the fertile river valleys of the Middle East dance before your eyes? If not, you have yet to discover amaranth, quinoa, spelt, kamut and teff, the quintet of nutritional powerhouses known as the ancient grains. The legends behind their origins many millennia past, their loss over time and their ultimate modern revival - literally tell the story of civilization.

programme.desc: Serge Ibaka grew up poor and at times homeless in the streets of Brazzaville. His mom died when he was 7. His dad was in prison when he was 12. Despite these overwhelming obstaces he achieved his dream of becoming an NBA Champion. This documentary follows Serge on his journey home to the Republic of Congo, to show them the NBA Championship trophy but more importantly he shares a message that through hard work and determination, "Anything is Possible"!

programme.title: Everyday Spartans: Episode 5
programme.desc: After an extraordinary adventure in Japan, the Spartans head to America . De Sena is not pleased with the baggage they are carrying– lateness, injuries and poor body maintenance. Will an extended dip in an icy lake shake their reverie? Under the guidance of a survival expert, they must climb a massive rock as one unit with only a rope holding them all together. Every member must think every step through for the sake of the team. For, one miscalculated step could very well lead to disaster. Can they handle the heat of this challenge?

programme.title: Everyday Spartans: Episode 6
programme.desc: The next set of challenges may be in the woods, but the Spartans are not happy campers. De Sena has amped up the level of the challenges both inside and outside the water. To make things worse, their mission to find a missing kettlebell does not go as planned. Not only did they have to deep dive in cold water on a failed mission, they now need to dive deep within themselves to understand how they reacted to failure. A Mind Doctor helps them make sense of the situation and find ways to finish the challenge successfully. Just what have they learnt from their deep dives?

programme.title: Everyday Spartans: Episode 7
programme.desc: In the last episode of this exciting original series presented by Rakuten, the team is thrilled to hear that two of them have qualified for the Elite World Championships in Lake Tahoe. While they get a chance to compete with the most elite racers in the world, the snowy conditions means that the toughest race in the world just got tougher. In the meanwhile, they reflect on their inspiring journey which took eight everyday people through a series of highs and lows and made them do things they had never dreamt possible. What have they learnt from this journey?

programme.title: SEVE - Artist, Fighter, Legend
programme.desc: Seve Ballesteros was an artist, a golfing Picasso. He was a fighter against back injury, rivals on the golf course, a disintegrating swing, and finally cancer. He remains a legend, a multi-major champion and the man who made the modern Ryder Cup. This is his story, from members of his inner circle, other sporting greats and from himself via newly unearthed material.

programme.title: Champions: Sweden
programme.desc: Three-time Olympic medallist and 2012 FIFA World Women's Coach of the Year Pia Sundhage recalls her reaction at being called up to join the Swedish women's national team. Speaking to Stina Blackstenius, FIFA Women's World Cup Bronze Medal and two Olympic Games Silver Medal winner, and Molly Johansson, both players for BK Häcken, Pia explains her belief that football gave her a way of life. She relates the feelings she had when she took part in the Olympic Games, and how playing in France made her stronger, while Molly shares her goals for the future.

programme.title: Andrés Iniesta, The Unexpected Hero
programme.desc: This is the story of a normal person who does extraordinary things. Someone who pursues and achieves triumphs through taking care of the small details, because these are, after all, the ones that make him a different soccer player. We all know the Iniesta-magician of the ball, who conquered two triplets with Barça and raised the World Champion Cup with the Spanish National Team. And yes, of course we know their great sporting moments. But who is behind this global sport superstar? Through exceptional witnesses such as Leo Messi, Neymar Jr., Pep Guardiola, Sergio Ramos, Luis Enrique and a long etc.

programme.title: Champions: France
programme.desc: Wendie Renard, seven-time UEFA champion and FIFA Women's Player of the Year in 2018, awaits the arrival of Annie Fortems, a pioneer of French women's football, and Sonia Ouchene, a promising young player from Stade de Reims, at the Olympique Lyonnais stadium. Wendie recalls the start of her career, her victories and difficult moments including racist attacks. Annie reveals how her generation brought women's football into the French mainstream, despite receiving death threats, while Sonia speaks freely about the gender pay gap between women's and men's football. The meeting of the three is resplendent with mutual admiration.

programme.title: Made in Senegal
programme.desc: Made in Senegal is a story about will, dreams, determination, faith, rebellion, courage and love. The film invites us on a journey through Sadio´s different and highly diverse worlds - from the rural life in a small village in the far south of Senegal to the spotlight of world football by playing for Liverpool FC, even winning the Champions Leagues as number 10 with the world watching… The interaction of animations, documentary scenes, a diverse set of in-depth interviews and archive footage brings Sadio´s past to life and creates an exciting and emotional plot.

programme.title: Break Point: a Davis Cup Story
programme.desc: Led by Rafa Nadal, the Spanish team were this year’s favourite until they suffered a serious setback. The team’s number two player, Roberto Bautista, had to leave the competition for his hometown to be at his father´s side during the last hours of his life. Without Bautista, Nadal and Feliciano López heroically managed to lead the team into the final. But then came the news that thrilled tennis fans worldwide: Bautista is coming back to the competition after his father´s funeral, and he´s ready to play. United again, the members of the Spanish team fight for victory in the grand final, where something far beyond tennis is at stake.

programme.title: Tabitha & Davina
programme.desc: Demanding Bridezilla Davina barks commands. Crabby Bridezilla Tabby brawls with her future sister-in-law.

programme.title: Phantoms of The Desert - Asia's Last Cheetahs
programme.desc: The Asiatic Cheetah is a critically endangered species. Only around 100 of these wild cats survive today in Iran. Animal welfare activists have launched a broad rescue mission to save these hunters from extinction.

programme.title: Australian Penguins
programme.desc: Little Penguins are the smallest penguin in the world and are the only species that live and breed in Australia. This documentary focuses on the penguin colony that live on Western Australia's, Penguin Island. The island's Discovery Centre houses a small group of rescued penguins, which have either been injured, orphaned or abandoned as chicks. Australian Penguins gives an insight into their amazing stories of survival and all the funny things this group of Little Penguins get up to.

programme.title: Deeper - The Adventure of Ultra Deep Diving
programme.desc: There are more people who have walked on the surface of the Moon than people who have dived below a depth of 800 feet. Pascal Bernabé is one of them. In 1996, still unknown to the public, he accepts to dive 577 feet deep to bring back two robots trapped in a cave. The mission is a success. But Pascal wants more, he becomes addicted to ultra-deep diving. Soon, he makes a new successful attempt to go below 660 feet.

programme.title: The Okinaway of Life
programme.desc: A wonderful journey in the heart of a legendary civilization that owns the world longevity record in good health. The archipelago of Okinawa, located in the Pacific Ocean at the very south of Japan sees its population with almost no diseases. What are the secrets of Okinawa’s inhabitants ? How can we live longer, happy and in good health ?

programme.title: 47 Below
programme.desc: 47 Below is the astonishing true story of how one Australian (Geoff Wilson) boldly embarked on a solo, unsupported crossing of Antarctica. The experts gave him no chance of success – all saying that it was an impossible challenge for a rookie adventurer.

programme.title: Australia's Camel Man
programme.desc: Afghan Willie explores the outback on his camel train, the limestone formations, the Pinnacles, of Western Australia, The Spirit of Aviation in Bundaberg, with a memorial to aviator Bert Hinkler.

programme.title: Taylor Mason: Hysterical Perspective
programme.desc: Taylor Mason's career has taken him from Carnegie Hall to The Sydney Opera House, to countless television appearances and a million online "hits."

programme.title: Everybody Loves Chris Rock
programme.desc: Comedian, actor, and producer Chris Rock boasts critical acclaim and global stardom. We take an intimate look into the life of one of the world's greatest entertainers as fans agree Everyone Loves Chris Rock.

programme.title: Eddie Murphy Laugh 'Til It Hurts
programme.desc: Almost six decades later Eddie Murphy remains loved by fans for his infectious smile and goofy laugh. Learn about many challenges Eddie is faced with along his way to stardom as Eddie continues to make his fans Laugh 'Til it Hurts.

programme.title: Where Do We Go From Here
programme.desc: When Jen starts her new job as a nurse at the 'Easy Love Care Home', she is surprised to find James, a 25-year-old man living and working in the building. James and his three elderly best friends hatch a plan to go on one last adventure and the only medical cover they can get is the one person who doesn't want to be around old people. Will their plan go off without a hitch or is there a sell by date on adventure?

programme.title: Adam Sandler Funny Guy
programme.desc: Adam remains a consistent favorite among fans who are comforted that they will always have a good time. Get the inside story on this fascinating actor, comedian, screenwriter, producer, husband, father, and forever FUNNY GUY.

programme.title: The Lightkeepers
programme.desc: Seth Atkins (Academy Award Winner, RICHARD DREYFUSS) is the light keeper on a deserted outer beach of Cape Cod in the year 1912. Seth’s assistant suddenly quits, no longer able to tolerate his bad attitude and hate for women. He is left to manage the lighthouse on his own, until a mysterious, strapping young man washes up on shore with the desire to become Seth’s new assistant. They eventually swap tales from their past, beginning to explain each of their distaste for women. It’s not long before the two men must contend with the lovely Ruth Graham (MAMIE GUMMER) and her housekeeper, Mrs. Bascom (Golden Globe Nominee BLYTHE DANNER) who move into a nearby cottage for the summer.

programme.title: Let Go
programme.desc: Follows the intertwining stories of Walter Dishman, a melancholy parole officer struggling with the doldrums of married life, and three eccentric ex-convicts recently placed under his supervision. Starring Kavein Hart, Gillian Jacobs, David Denman, Simon Helberg, Ed Asner.

programme.title: Satin
programme.desc: A washed up Vegas lounge singer, Jack Satin (Hamilton Von Watts), has no money, no job, and delusional aspirations of fame. When Jack is forced to leave Vegas, he packs up his old Cadillac and hits the road for Atlantic City. There, Jack meets local bar owner Lauren (Melissa Joan Hart) who helps him understand there might more to life than chasing fame and fortune.

programme.title: Visions
programme.desc: While on a pursuit, a homicide detective is accidentally electrocuted and temporarily blinded. When terrifying images of events he sees in his mind eventually come true, it sparks the interest of a top government official who seems to know more than he is letting on.

programme.title: Journey from the Heart
programme.desc: Grandma Lee tours the California wilderness in a motor home with her Americanized family, teaches them Tai Chi and the ancient Chinese way to deal with modern American life.

programme.title: Curse of the Black Dahlia
programme.desc: A successful marketing executive working in a building erected on the very same lot where the mutilated body of a fallen actress was found back in 1947 is haunted by terrifying nightmares and vivid hallucinations in a dark thriller that brings Hollywood's darkest mystery screaming into the 21st Century.

programme.title: P.U.N.K.S.
programme.desc: A group of misfit teens evade a corrupt scientist when they steal and attempt to return a suit that delivers supernatural strength to its wearer.

programme.title: The Bay- The Beginning
programme.desc: Episode 10- Pete (Kristos Andrews) continues his search for Brian on the dark side of Bay City where he encounters a streetwalker named Orchid (Terri Ivens) and her threatening gang. Tamara (Celeste Fianna) tries to step in to defend her cousin. Will (Derrell Whitt) discovers Lianna is a prostitute and the two find themselves in danger with pimp Chase Walker (Brian Gaskell). Nathan (Scott Bailey) will do anything for a story as Zoey (Taylor Stanley) tries to intervene. Marly (Martha Madison) learns some devastating news that changes her life forever.

programme.title: Sole Searching

programme.title: Where the Cheeseburger was Invented
programme.desc: When you head to America, Louisville might not be the first place you think to visit. But it should be.

programme.title: Paradise Tossed
programme.desc: As the SEC investigation comes to a close, Dan is faced with a major life decision and devastating news from his family.

programme.title: Blazing through Texas
programme.desc: John and Ariel check out San Antonio, home to the Alamo, the River Walk, and Emma Faye Rudkin.

programme.title: Florida & Appalachian Trail
programme.desc: Ariel meets record breaker Jennifer Pharr Davis and hears how being a part of nature changed her life.

programme.title: Discovering New York

programme.title: Roadtripping through New Mexico
programme.desc: John and Ariel get a taste for rock formations and hot air balloons on their road trip across the “Land of Enchantment”.

programme.title: Exploring Colorado
programme.desc: Ariel meets up with astronaut John Herrington and they explore colorful Colorado.

programme.title: Trails & Trailblazers: Canyons of Arizona & Utah
programme.desc: Navajo Marathoner Shaun Martin takes Ariel on a run through Canyon de Chelly before she checks out the mysterious Antelope Canyon.

programme.title: Trails & Trailblazers: Wild Alaska
programme.desc: Ariel Tweto, an Alaskan bush pilot, introduces us to the wild place she calls home.

programme.title: Kitesurfing in Oregon
programme.desc: Ariel tries kitesurfing at the Columbia River Gorge and tests her skills on a tree-to-tree ropes course outside of Portland.

programme.title: Big Food Small Towns
programme.desc: Guy stops in small towns to dig in to big-time eats. In Raymond, NH, a butchery cranks out scratch-made corn dogs. In Rocky Hill, NJ, a 1700s inn turned gastropub dishes out a tomato twist on burgers and a spin on disco fries.

programme.title: Righteous Bites
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, the Fat Jerry sammie, in Monterey, California, abalone sliders, in Aiea, Hawaii, oxtail soups and grilled turkey sandwich.

programme.title: Turning Tables Songversation
programme.desc: Singer India Arie teams with chef Brian Clevenger for a Songversation and dining experience.

programme.title: Rachel & Paul in New Orleans
programme.desc: Rachel and Paul go on a journey of discovery, luck and love through the Big Easy.

programme.title: Alana & Josh in Fort Worth
programme.desc: Alana and Josh try their luck in Fort Worth, Texas, where cowboys and cosmopolitans walk hand in hand.

programme.title: Gary & Dean in Washington D.C.
programme.desc: Gary and Dean go on a game of chance in America’s capital.

programme.title: United States of Sports: Midwest Bound
programme.desc: The guys hit the Midwest for an unforgettable road trip through Detroit, Chicago and Cincinnati.

programme.title: United States of Sports: Welcome to the South
programme.desc: Copa90’s Eli and Timbsy and Love Island’s Josh Denzel go on a once-in-a-lifetime road trip.

programme.title: America's Musical Journey
programme.desc: A cross-country adventure through the musical heritage of America and the cultural cities where America's music was born.

programme.title: City Breaks Bukhara, Uzbekistan
programme.desc: Travel with Alexandra, as she unravels the secrets of the ancient Uzbek city of Bukhara. From exploring the ancient fortress to local bazaars along with visiting a traditional carpet factory.

programme.title: Backpack Nazereth, Israel
programme.desc: Sabrina is in the ancient city of Tiberias, known for its natural hot springs, where she visits the Sea of Galilee. She later visits the Basilica of Annunciation in Nazereth and Via Dolorosa in Jerusalem.

programme.title: Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Rishikesh, India (EN)
programme.desc: The sacred city of Rishikesh is a haven for pilgrims, yogis and adventure lovers from all around the world. Healer and Rohan experience the thrill of river rafting on the spirited rapids of the holy river Ganga. After this adrenaline rush, they visit a quiet beach to cool off but are surprised and amused to see it filled with couples on pre wedding shoots.

programme.title: Off The Grid Majuli 2, Assam
programme.desc: In Majuli, Alex experiences first hand of getting to know the rich cultural heritage of satras treasured by the locals. She learns that the inhabitants are a part of the Mishing tribes and finally meets the forest man.

programme.title: Kissed by the Sea Penghu Island, Taiwan
programme.desc: Alex visits Taiwan’s Penghu island, starting his day with a swim, later trying out a vermicelli noodle delicacy and visiting the Penghu Mazu temple. Further, taking a boat ride he visits the Chimei island, exploring and interacting with the locals and trying water activities. Finally indulging himself with the locals playing volleyball.

programme.title: Backpack Jerusalem, Israel
programme.desc: Sabrina takes a guided tour of City of David and visits Western Wall, learns about its significance and ends her day with exploring Cardo market, Mahane Yehuda Markets and having a traditional delicacy, Shamburak.

programme.title: Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Jim Corbett, India (EN)
programme.desc: Healer is upset with Rohan as he leaves him behind and goes in search of the big cats of the jungle. Rohan meets up with some villagers who stay at the edge of the tiger reserve and discusses the human-animal conflicts faced by them. At the Corbett Museum, he discovers some interesting facets of the man after whom the park was named.

programme.title: Off The Grid Bomdila, Arunachal Pradesh
programme.desc: Alex explores the wild side of nature while hiking in Nameri National park & Tiger Reserve. She visits a 500 years old tribal settlement, finds unique wooden and stone houses protecting them from cold

programme.title: Kissed by the Sea Mauritius 1(EN)
programme.desc: Sakshi explores the magical island of Mauritius starting with an abandoned lighthouse, then exploring the underwater life by snorkelling and undersea walking. Also, popular for its Rum, she then visits the sugar factory, ending with “walk with the lion” tour.

programme.title: Backpack Eilat, Israel
programme.desc: Sabrina visits Ein Gedi oasis and Masada plateau and Dead Sea on her way to Eilat, where she visits the beaches, Red Canyon and Wadi Shani, Nimna National Park and experiences the nighlife.

programme.title: Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Jilling Terraces, India (EN)
programme.desc: The lesser-visited Kumaon region of Uttarakhand is largely unspoiled, and boasts pleasant small towns with panoramic mountain views. In one of these small towns, Rohan sets out to take in these panoramic mountain views through paragliding. Will Healer, his partner-in-crime, be satisfied sitting on the sidelines? Or will the two of them together sail fearlessly across the skies?

programme.title: Off The Grid Tawang, Arunachal Pradesh
programme.desc: Alex travels through the Sela Pass, one of the highest mountain passes and reaches Tawang. In Tawang, she pays a visit to the Tawang Monastery which is the largest in India and second largest in the world.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Asian Food Trail
programme.desc: Throughout the series Luke is joined by close friends, local chefs and of course his family which play such a large part of his life. Luke Nguyen’s Food Trail tracks Luke’s life and career from where it all started in Sydney, moving to Saigon and then onto Hong Kong. From Sydney Australia where Luke grew up first got inspired to cook, all the way to Saigon coming full circle with the grand opening of Luke’s new restaurant, only weeks away. He takes us on a guided behind the scenes experience the nerves have been building with the opening of his dream fine dining restaurant in Saigon. Join Luke as he cooks a variety of exquisite Asian and visits some of his favourite restaurants and nightspots where we see a different side of each exciting and sophisticated city.

programme.title: The Cook’s Pantry with Matt Sinclair Season 1
programme.desc: From an early age, Matt knew he wanted to create something unique with his food. From the suburbs of Sydney, Matty spent over a decade working in hospitality. Here he evolved a curiosity of the industry, and the desire to work with food as a career. This saw him audition for MasterChef, where he quickly became a household favourite, triumphing as the 2016 runner up. Shortly after, Matt’s dream to own a successful food truck business came true. The quick growth and success saw their business grow into a fullyfledged restaurant in Noosa on the Sunshine Coast. The Cooks Pantry is a weekly cooking show that celebrates the creation of wholesome Australian food. Join Matt Sinclair and his fellow foodies Courtney Roulston and Michael Weldon. As successful MasterChef contestants, the team combine together to help you create simple, delicious food.

It was also one of the deadliest, with 161 lives lost and one thousand injured. The scale of the Joplin disaster drew teams of scientists to find out what made this storm so destructive and what can be done to protect communities and people in the future. What did they learn by peering inside the violent realm of a Super Tornado?

He doesn’t treat his MS with conventional medication he self-medicates illegally, with cannabis. A hunger for helping similarly afflicted people birthed a need to fight for a change to the law that prevents access to cannabis. We follow Clark and other campaigners to protests battling on the front lines up and down the UK.

It also explores claims that their punishment has been a sham, as reporter Deborah Davies investigates how inmates at secure units are treated and interviews experts to learn whether eight years has been sufficient time to successfully rehabilitate the pair.

Eastern promoter J.B."Dude" Dawson, is behind the gang as he is out to prevent the co-op members from striking oil before their lease expires, so he can secure the property for his company. When Ward, with the help of Arnold and his daughter Sally, arranges for a new driller to be brought in, the replacement man is killed and one of Dawson's men takes his place.

programme.title: For Robbing the Dead
programme.desc: For Robbing the Dead is a story of compassion - compassion toward those who may seem the least deserving of Christian love. It follows the story of Henry Heath, a law officer in 1862 Salt Lake City. Heath finds himself responsible for the well-being of a prisoner whom he despises - an impoverished French immigrant named Jean Baptiste who is convicted of robbing the graves of the recently deceased. Baptiste is exiled to Antelope Island in the Great Salt Lake. With no one willing to look after this man, Henry Heath becomes Baptiste's sole defense against the hostile isolation of Antelope Island and the contempt of an entire community. Through his somewhat reluctant service, Heath's heart softens and his own sorrows find relief.

As they try to solve one of the most bizarre mysteries of the 20th century, the group are not prepared for what they discover or for what finds them….

programme.title: Guardians of the Tomb
programme.desc: Jumanji meets The Mummy in this edge-of-your-seat action thriller, starring Kelsey Grammer (X-Men), Kellan Lutz (Twilight) and Bingbing Li (Transformers). In a quest to find a lost colleague, a team of scientists find themselves deep underground in an ancient labyrinth, battling Chinese magic and flesh-eating spiders, while trying to unearth a secret that has been buried for centuries.

programme.title: The Titan
programme.desc: As planet Earth’s future hangs in the balance of becoming uninhabitable, the human race faces a cataclysmic ultimatum: adapt or die… Hotshot Air Force pilot, Rick Janssen (Sam Worthington: Avatar) is chosen for a military experiment that will create a human being capable of surviving the harsh environments of Saturn’s moon, TITAN. The experiment is successful, turning Rick into a super-human. But it also creates deadly side-effects which threaten the lives of Rick, his wife (Taylor Schilling: Orange is the New Black) Abigail, his family, and possibly humanity itself. This exhilarating sci-fi thriller from the producers of Insidious and Sense8, also stars Nathalie Emmanuel (Game of Thrones) , Tom Wilkinson (2 time Academy Award® Nominee) and Agyness Deyn (Clash of the Titans, Hard Sun).

programme.title: Guardians of the Tomb

In a quest to find a lost colleague, a team of scientists find themselves deep underground in an ancient labyrinth, battling Chinese magic and flesh-eating spiders, while trying to unearth a secret that has been buried for centuries.

programme.title: Overcome
programme.desc: In the Bible, Saul persecuted Christ's church and its followers. Overcome parallels this story. Set in modern day, a young man in high school mistreats anyone good around him, until he has a fateful accident which changes his life. Now he must make amends to all those around him, and try to become the person he knew he should have been the whole time.

programme.title: Love In Aruba
programme.desc: A lonely teacher (Amber) is hired by Connor, the single father of a struggling student. She is to tutor his daughter Macey (age 10) over a summer while they travel for his work. As Amber helps Macey, she sees glimpses of what’s missing in the family’s life. Their grand destinations are filled with rich items and potential rewarding business deals, but it’s missing heart. Amber’s influence fills the void and brings Macey and Connor together. With it, Amber starts to fall in love with Connor, but can he see her as anything beyond the hired help?

programme.title: Like Dandelion Dust
programme.desc: A compelling drama that explores the different meanings of being a parent through the gritty, realistic lives of the struggling, blue-collar Porters, and the privileged Campbell family. Their lives intersect, intertwine and collide, all for the love of a little boy.

programme.title: Civil Love
programme.desc: Rachel is a widow during the Civil War who holds the South responsible for her husband's death. When a wounded enemy soldier takes refuge in her barn, Rachel reluctantly helps him. As she gets to know him more, she realizes she must protect him from the dangerous men pursuing him, and discovers a courage she didn't know she had - the courage to love again.

programme.title: Timeless Love
programme.desc: Megan seems to have the perfect life with a wonderful husband named Thomas and 2 adorable children. Then she finds herself awakening from a coma – and discovers she is not and has never been married. But when she meets Thomas for real, she seizes the chance to help him fall in love with her, again—for the first time.

programme.title: Travel Bug
programme.desc: Travel bug will give you that yearning to see the world again in all its wonder through this series of short films. Experience different cultures and people now.

programme.title: Words That I Can't Express
programme.desc: Sometimes words aren’t enough and don’t need to be said. This playlist exemplifies that.

programme.title: Identity
programme.desc: Identity is who you are. This show explores this theme by showing different struggles and celebrating who we are.

programme.title: Comedy Hours
programme.desc: This show is dedicated to showcasing comedy short films that will make you laugh until you stop breathing.

programme.title: Documentary Hours
programme.desc: The world’s most interesting, creative, and best documentaries in bite-size and short film form. Discover the wonder of these docs now.

programme.title: Let's Be The Change
programme.desc: A show dedicated to activism and a world that we would like to see in the future. How can we improve our lives for future generations to thrive?

programme.title: Views From The Sky
programme.desc: Our world is so vast but this series of films takes us off the planet earth for a second and shows us the views from above. Houston, do we have a problem?

programme.title: Oddsockeaters
programme.desc: The Oddsockeaters are little mysterious creatures who steal your socks

programme.title: The Christmas Dragon
programme.desc: A group of orphans goes on a journey to restore the lost magic and save Christmas.

programme.title: Instructions not Included
programme.desc: A man finds his family threatened when the birth mother of his six-year-old daughter resurfaces

programme.title: 6 Below
programme.desc: An adrenaline-seeking snowboarder is forced to battle his own personal demons as he fights for survival

programme.title: Singularity
programme.desc: A supercomputer has rid the earth of its greatest plague: Humans. But there are few survivors.

programme.title: The Daltons - Season 1 - The Daltons’ Christmas | The Daltons go Snow-crazy | Totem Pole Daltons
programme.desc: The Daltons build a chimney and fireplace for Santa Claus… with the hidden ambition of escaping through the conduit! Unfortunately, a few inmates hold a grudge against Santa and they’re eager to get even with him for once and all…

programme.title: Louie - Season 2 - Episodes 31-33
programme.desc: Louie, Draw Me a Mammoth Louie, Draw Me a Carriage Louie, Draw Me a Stagecoach Have you ever dreamed of exploring an island or travelling to the moon? Do you yearn to race cars or talk to friendly bears? No problem! Everything is possible with Louie! With his and Yoko´s help, you´ll learn how to draw while having fun!

programme.title: Monk Little Dog - Season 1 - Episodes 1-7
programme.desc: Monk hammers a nail Monk on a desert island Monk watches TV Monk goes ballooning Monk takes a bath Monk versus Sushi Monk has really got to go! Monk is a jovial little dog who obstinately tries his best but always fails! When thins aren’t working out for Monk, catastrophes follow. Things can get totally out of control real fast!

programme.title: Mouk - Season 1 - Episodes 27-28
programme.desc: Paper Chase Above the Trees Mouk and Chavapa are two globe-trotters: they travel around the world riding their bikes! From Tokyo to New York, from Australia to Madagascar and through Greece, these two friends meet inhabitants from all over the planet… and because nowhere feels quite like home, adventure is always knocking at their door! Climb on a bike with them and discover this realistic, modern and colourful world. Amazing people, unbelievable landscapes, and unknown customs: our two travellers will discover many different countries together. Beyond the differences, they share beautiful experiences and make friends everywhere!

programme.title: Monk Little Dog - Season 1 - Episodes 36-42
programme.desc: Monk pumps iron Monk goes motorcycling Monk meets Quack-Quack Monk celebrates Christmas Monk the magician Monk, Mouch and the toothache Monk goes curling Monk is a jovial little dog who obstinately tries his best but always fails! When thins aren’t working out for Monk, catastrophes follow. Things can get totally out of control real fast! Director/creator: Sungjae Kim, Natalys Raut Sieuzac, Suhoon Kim

programme.title: Telmo And Tula, Little Cooks - Season 1 - Episodes 4-6
programme.desc: Chocolate Cake | Anchovy and Tomatoe Sandwich | Chocolate Chip Cookies Telmo & Tula is a very fun animated series in which children learn to cook the best breakfasts, sandwiches, salads and desserts in a safe and entertaining way. Telmo and Tula will teach children how fun it is to prepare delicious meals step by step.

programme.title: Munki and Trunk - Season 1 - Episodes 4-6
programme.desc: Walk This Way | Bloomin' Emergency | I Would Walk 500 Miles Munki and Trunk is a tree-crashing, rock-smashing, water-splashing, fruit-mashing knockabout comedy adventure! Munki (a bold, banana-juggling adventurer) and Trunk (a big-hearted and optimistic elephant) are best friends. They do everything together - swinging, stomping and somersaulting as they explore their jungle world, hatching plans, solving problems, having fun and helping friends along the way.

programme.title: The Daltons - Season 1 - The fakir | The Magician | Reincarnation
programme.desc: A fakir turns up in the penitentiary. When they discover that this “ snake-charmer ” can make a rope rise into the air simply by playing his flute, Joe declares that the Daltons are going to follow the Fakir’s teachings. But they have to carry out other very painful exercises before getting to the flute trick. Oddly enough, Averell proves to be the most gifted student…

programme.title: Nuts Nuts Nuts - Season 1 - Episodes 8-14
programme.desc: The sheepfold Oasis Shifting sand The arrival of the penguins The mill Oil The farm Nuts is an obsessed, clumsy blue squirrel. He lives with other animals ina crazy, lively, funny and sometimes absurd world. Wherever he goes, he causes disasters...

programme.title: The Daltons - Season 1 - Camera Scam | The Daltons go baking | The Dalton Rodeo
programme.desc: When a film crew visits the penitentiary, the Daltons seize the chance to act as stars … and take off. But of course, everything in movies is just an illusion… including escape attempts!

programme.title: Louie - Season 2 - Episodes 37-39
programme.desc: Louie, Draw Me a Mole Louie, Draw Me a Ghost Louie, Draw Me a Witch Have you ever dreamed of exploring an island or travelling to the moon? Do you yearn to race cars or talk to friendly bears? No problem! Everything is possible with Louie! With his and Yoko´s help, you´ll learn how to draw while having fun!

programme.title: Telmo And Tula, Little Cooks - Season 1 - Episodes 7-9
programme.desc: Bread Rolls | Jam and Cake Roll | Crab Meat Sandwich Telmo & Tula is a very fun animated series in which children learn to cook the best breakfasts, sandwiches, salads and desserts in a safe and entertaining way. Telmo and Tula will teach children how fun it is to prepare delicious meals step by step.

programme.title: Glumpers - Season 1 - Episodes 71-80
programme.desc: From episode 71 to 80 The Glumpers are a gang of friends who live together in their home which becomes a kind of nuclear reactor where even a small interaction between its particles can cause a chain reaction with disastrous consequences.

programme.title: The Daltons - Season 1 - Stormy Weather | Bubble Trouble | Nitroglycerine Nightmare
programme.desc: After Fabulous Falcon’s seminar on the ritual rain dance, Averell turns out to have a real gift for changing the climate. The Daltons decide to hide inside the spectacular downpours he provokes to escape. But the climate change speads and the Broken Wings tribe is not happy with the situation…

programme.title: Telmo And Tula, Little Cooks - Season 1 - Episodes 28-30
programme.desc: Almond Ice Cream | Mushroom Shaped Cookies | Tropical Sandwich Telmo & Tula is a very fun animated series in which children learn to cook the best breakfasts, sandwiches, salads and desserts in a safe and entertaining way. Telmo and Tula will teach children how fun it is to prepare delicious meals step by step.

programme.title: Princess and the Dragon
programme.desc: Discover the enchanting secrets of the magic mirror! While wandering around the secret chambers of the castle on her seventh birthday, Princess Barbara finds a magic book which transports her to wonderland. In this world full of dragons, colourful creatures and gnomes, Barbara sets off on an exciting adventure to find a mirror that can connect her to her friends in a faraway country.

programme.title: Flying the Nest
programme.desc: After an attack by the formidable falcon Shadow, the numbers in a flock of Plover are vastly depleted whilst migrating back to their homeland. However, when all hope seems to be lost, beauty emerges in the form of an energetic new-born chick, Ploey. Quickly learning the ways of the flock, Ploey lives life to its fullest and meets Ploverina, a female chick with whom he immediately falls in love. A twist of fate leaves Ploey alone and unable to fly, as his flock departs across the ocean for winter. Isolated and afraid, he is forced to embark on a journey where he must use his cunning, and rely on the help of newly-found friends to make it through the winter and see his true love once more...

programme.title: The Ark
programme.desc: The Ark is a retelling of the biblical story of Noah and The Ark. Noah, a farmer and family man, is instructed by an angel to build an ark in the middle of a desert in order to save both his family and the faithful from a devastating flood. A seemingly impossible task, especially when his sons refuse to believe him and help, Noah risks ridicule and humiliation from the degenerate townsfolk as well as his loving but exasperated family, in his quest to carry out his God-given task.

programme.title: 10 Things We Should Do Before We Breakup
programme.desc: The night Abigail (Christina Ricci) meets Ben (Hamish Linklater) at a bar, they jokingly come up with a list of things to do before their imagined breakup, knowingly full well they’ll never even start a relationship. But when the joke turns in to a one-night stand things become a whole lot more complicated.

programme.title: Red Dog: The Early Years
programme.desc: RED DOG: THE EARLY YEARS is a glorious tale of youthful adventure set in the Australian outback as a young boy and an Australian Kelpie sheep dog become the best of friends. Set in the late 1980s, 11-year-old Mick is sent to live with his stern farmer grandfather on a vast cattle station. There, he forms an unbreakable bond with a cute puppy he finds covered in blue mud after a storm. Together the pair embark on a series of great adventures amidst the stunning Aussie landscape.

programme.title: A Birder's Guide to Everything
programme.desc: Sideways meets stand by me in this endearing story of friendhip, family & a place in bird watching history books. On the eve of his widower father's second wedding, fifteen-year-old birding fanatic David Portnoy (Kodi Smit-McPhee) thinks that he's made the discovery of a lifetime, the extinct Labrador duck! Now he and the two other stalwart members of the local Young Birders Society, joined by their headstrong photographer classmate Ellen (Katie Chang), take off on an epic road trip in search of the rare bird and elusive answers to teenage questions large and small.

programme.title: Life at These Speeds
programme.desc: We all have those memories. Indelible, perfect memories that make you glow with happiness. Like the way the sun shone off her hair the morning you met her or the sound of your best friend’s laughter after an inside joke or your coach’s inspiring speech or daydreaming with the love of your life about your future together. After a teenager's friends are killed in an accident, he finds running allows him to remember them perfectly. Running however also brings him notoriety. Soon he finds himself caught between keeping the past alive and making new memories in the present.

programme.title: The Deal
programme.desc: Set against the backdrop of an international finance deal in New York and Peru, 'The Deal' is an intense political drama which explores how far people will go to get what they want.

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: They chose the worst man for the job. They expected him to fail, but he wasn't about to let a witness be murdered on his watch. Personal demons put Jack (Bruce Willis - Die Hard, Anti-Life) a New York City cop at rock bottom. But when he's assigned to escort a petty criminal to testify before the grand jury, a violent turn of events means this down-and-out cop needs to pull it together to save not only the life of the witness but his own as they are hunted across the city. The clock is ticking in this exhilarating race against time. Will justice be served or will there be two more bodies to add to the crime toll of the city?

programme.title: Jimmy P
programme.desc: A troubled Native American veteran forms an extraordinary friendship with his maverick French psychoanalyst as they try to find a cure to his suffering.

programme.title: Moto X Kids
programme.desc: A motorcycle racing coach and a chimpanzee defend a dirt track from a pair of ruffians. Starring Lorenzo Lamas ("Renegade") and Josh Hutcherson ("The Hunger Games").

programme.title: The Intergalactic Adventures of Max Cloud
programme.desc: When video-game enthusiast, Sarah (Isabelle Allen), is transported into her favorite game, she finds herself on an intergalactic prison, home to the most dangerous villains in the galaxy. The only way to escape the game is to complete it. Teaming up with space hero, Max Cloud (Scott Adkins), Sarah battles the terrifying planet while her best friend, Cowboy, controls the game from her bedroom in Brooklyn. Sit down, plug in, and get ready for a sci-fi adventure like no other.

programme.title: Guardians of the Tomb
programme.desc: An innocent discovery of a well-preserved mummified Emperor unearths a 2000-year-old nightmare - a secret that should have remained buried. A team of scientists, who lose a colleague in an ancient labyrinth, must work together to recover him while trying to make the discovery of a century. In their quest to rescue him, they find themselves underground, battling ancient, terrifying Chinese magic and making their way through a swarm of deadly, man-eating spiders – only to uncover the secret behind the insects’ power and intelligence.
